name: Less Something = More Life
description:
Less Something = More Life

You must fight for your home comforts by confronting the intruders that arrive at your door. 

Gangs of creatures you fear most have sniffed out your whereabouts and are here to destroy your home and everything in it! 

Left click on enemies to kill them and to prevent your house from crumbling. 

CREATED BY Joe Darcy (Triangle), and Rosie Campbell (exophagious).

Coding and Music: Joe Darcy

Artwork and Animation: Rosie Campbell

CONTROLS

Left click to destroy attackers.

Play in Full Screen mode for best experience.
